name: JetPack Aviation
headline: Flying motorcycles
description: Our focus is on developing the smallest, fastest heavy lift optionally piloted VTOL aircraft. Our aircraft can be operated in urban environments with no risk of rotor strikes - we don't use rotor systems! Ship anything from downtown LA to downtown San Diego in 20 mins!

## About **JetPack Aviation**
JPA has been creating VTOL aircraft for over 10 years and are the undisputed leaders in turbine powered, micro VTOLs. Based in Ventura just north of Los Angeles our mechanical, electrical/computer and flight systems engineers have years of experience in designing, prototyping and building VTOL aircraft. We design and build everything in house.
Our JetPacks have been seen around the world in movies, TV commercials and Red Bull air races.
# We Built the Worlds First **JetPack!**
## Get Your JetPack Aviation Apparel!
[Shop Now](http://www.jetpackaviation.com/<https:/shop.jetpackaviation.com/>)

generated_description:
**JetPack Aviation: Pioneering the Future of Personal Flight**

Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's W19 batch, JetPack Aviation (JPA) is redefining what aerial mobility can look like. Headquartered in Los Angeles, California, with a small but passionate team of nine employees, JPA’s mission is straightforward: to create flying motorcycles.

Initially, the focus was on developing compact, fast, heavy-lift optionally piloted VTOL (Vertical Take-Off and Landing) aircraft. Their innovative designs eliminate traditional rotor systems, making their vehicles safe for urban environments. Imagine shipping goods from downtown LA to downtown San Diego in just 20 minutes—this capability is not far off with JPA's technology.

The company boasts a robust engineering operation with over a decade of experience in creating turbine-powered micro VTOLs. Everything from design to prototyping and manufacturing happens in-house. Their Jetpacks, which have made appearances in films, commercials, and high-adrenaline events like Red Bull air races, position JPA as a leader in this exciting domain.

Excitingly, JPA has developed the *SPEEDER AUV*, an aircraft designed for versatility and rapid logistics. For those eager to experience the thrill of flying, JetPack Aviation also offers opportunities to fly their jetpacks through training programs.

Regularly engaging with their community via platforms like [Facebook](http://www.jetpackaviation.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/jetpackaviation>), [Youtube](http://www.jetpackaviation.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/jetpackaviation>), [Instagram](http://www.jetpackaviation.com/<https:/www.instagram.com/jetpackaviation/>), and [Twitter](http://www.jetpackaviation.com/<https:/twitter.com/jetpackaviation>), JPA is not only innovating in the skies but also building a brand that resonates with enthusiasts and futurists alike.

For more information, you can explore their offerings and vision at their website: [jetpackaviation.com](http://www.jetpackaviation.com).

In essence, JetPack Aviation is not just building flying machines; they're creating a new paradigm for personal and commercial flight. We’re on the cusp of a transportation revolution, and JPA is leading the charge.
